isis.stitle: GAUGES AND WARNING LIGHTS - DIAGNOSTICS - ELECTRONIC SERVICE TOOL DIAGNOSTICS

svcproc.title: ELECTRONIC SERVICE TOOL DIAGNOSTICS
svcproc.para: Operation and accuracy of the speedometer, tachometer, fuel, oil pressure, water temperature and voltmeter, can be verified with an EST, without removing the cluster. The Pro-Link 9000, with the Instrument Panel Cartridge Kit, or the EZ-Tech, with the instrument cluster software, can be used to exercise the speedometer/tachometer, through the J1708 data link . Refer to the Pro-Link or EZ-Tech instrument cluster software manual for instructions.
